001package game;
002
003import javax.swing.*;
004import java.awt.*;
005import java.awt.event.*;
006import java.net.URL;
007import java.util.List;
008//import java.awt.image.*;
009
010/**
011 * This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a 
012 * text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.
013 * 
014 * @author Michael Kolling
015 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2023) Christophe TARATIBU modified (2025/2026)
016 */
017public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
018{
019    /** The GameEngine object implementing the game logic */
020    private GameEngine aEngine;
021    /** The main frame for the GUI. */
022    private JFrame     aMyFrame;
023    /** Text field for user input. */
024    private JTextField aEntryField;
025    /** Text area for displaying text output. */
026    private JTextArea  aLog;
027    /** Label to show the image. */
028    private JLabel     aImage;
029    /** Label to show the timer. */
030    private JLabel     aTimerLabel;
031    /** Button to end the game session. */
032    private JButton   aQuitButton;
033    /** Directional buttons */
034    /** West button */
035    private JButton aGoWestButton;
036    /** North button */
037    private JButton aGoNorthButton;
038    /** South button */
039    private JButton aGoSouthButton;
040    /** East button */
041    private JButton aGoEastButton;
042    /** Up button */
043    private JButton aGoUpButton;
044    /** Down button */
045    private JButton aGoDownButton;
046    /** Look button */
047    private JButton aLookButton;
048    /** Eat button */
049    private JButton aEatButton;
050    /** Back button */
051    private JButton aBackButton;
052    /** Take button */
053    private JButton aTakeButton;
054    /** Drop button */
055    private JButton aDropButton;
056    /** Items button */
057    private JButton aItemsButton;
058    /** Test button */
059    private JButton aTestButton;
060
061    /**
062     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
063     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is
064     * needed.
065     * @param pGameEngine  The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
066     */
067    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
068    {
069        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
070        this.createGUI();
071    } // UserInterface(.)
072
073    /**
074     * Print out some text into the text area.
075     * @param pText Text to print
076     */
077    public void print( final String pText )
078    {
079        this.aLog.append( pText );
080        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
081    } // print(.)
082
083    /**
084     * Print out some text into the text area, with a carriage return.
085     * @param pText Text to print
086     */
087    public void println( final String pText )
088    {
089        this.print( pText + "\n" );
090    } // println(.)
091
092    /**
093     * Update the timer label with remaining time text.
094     * @param pText Remaining time
095     */
096    public void updateTimerLabel(final String pText){
097        this.aTimerLabel.setText("Time: " + pText);
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Show an image file in the interface.
102     * @param pImageName The name of the image file.
103     */
104    public void showImage( final String pImageName )
105    {
106        String vImagePath = "" + pImageName; // to change the directory
107        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
108        if ( vImageURL == null )
109       
110            System.out.println( "Image not found : " + vImagePath );
111        else {
112            //System.out.println("Image found : " + vImagePath );
113            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
114            Image vImage = vIcon.getImage();
115            Image vNewImage = vImage.getScaledInstance( 600, 400, Image.SCALE_SMOOTH);
116            vIcon = new ImageIcon( vNewImage );
117            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
118            //this.aImage.res
119            this.aMyFrame.pack();
120        }
121    } // showImage(.)
122
123    /**
124     * Enable or disable input in the entry field.
125     * @param pOnOff true to enable, false to disable
126     */
127    public void enable( final boolean pOnOff )
128    {
129        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff ); // enable/disable
130        if ( pOnOff ) { // enable
131            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 500 ); // cursor blink
132            this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this ); // reacts to entry
133        }
134        else { // disable
135            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor won't blink
136            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // won't react to entry
137        }
138    } // enable(.)
139
140    /**
141     * Set up graphical user interface.
142     */
143    private void createGUI()
144    {
145        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "The return of Yamata no Orochi" ); // change the title !
146        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
147        this.aQuitButton = new JButton("Quit");
148        this.aGoNorthButton = new JButton("go north");
149        this.aGoSouthButton = new JButton("go south");
150        this.aGoEastButton = new JButton("go east");
151        this.aGoWestButton = new JButton("go west");
152        this.aGoUpButton = new JButton("go up");
153        this.aGoDownButton = new JButton("go down");
154        this.aLookButton = new JButton("look");
155        this.aEatButton = new JButton("eat");
156        this.aBackButton = new JButton("back");
157        this.aTakeButton = new JButton("take");
158        this.aDropButton = new JButton("drop");
159        this.aItemsButton = new JButton("items");
160        this.aTestButton = new JButton("test");
161        this.aTimerLabel = new JLabel("Time: --:--");
162        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
163        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
164        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
165        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(200, 200) );
166        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(100,100) );
167
168        this.aImage = new JLabel();
169
170        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
171        vPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout() );
172        vPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
173        // Journal au centre
174        vPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
175        
176        // Bas de fenêtre : croix directionnelle + commandes au milieu + zone de saisie
177        JPanel vBottomPanel = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());
178        
179        // Panneau avec les boutons (en haut du bas)
180        JPanel vSouthPanel = new JPanel(new GridBagLayout());
181        GridBagConstraints vGbc = new GridBagConstraints();
182        vGbc.insets = new Insets(5,5,5,5);
183        // nord (en haut)
184        vGbc.gridx = 1; vGbc.gridy = 0; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
185        vSouthPanel.add(this.aGoNorthButton, vGbc);
186        // timer en haut à droite
187        vGbc.gridx = 3; vGbc.gridy = 0; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.NONE;
188        vSouthPanel.add(this.aTimerLabel, vGbc);
189        // ouest (à gauche)
190        vGbc.gridx = 0; vGbc.gridy = 1; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
191        vSouthPanel.add(this.aGoWestButton, vGbc);
192        // est (à droite)
193        vGbc.gridx = 2; vGbc.gridy = 1; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
194        vSouthPanel.add(this.aGoEastButton, vGbc);
195        // sud (en bas)
196        vGbc.gridx = 1; vGbc.gridy = 2; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
197        vSouthPanel.add(this.aGoSouthButton, vGbc);
198        // up (en haut à droite)
199        vGbc.gridx = 3; vGbc.gridy = 1; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
200        vSouthPanel.add(this.aGoUpButton, vGbc);
201        // down (en bas à droite)
202        vGbc.gridx = 3; vGbc.gridy = 2; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
203        vSouthPanel.add(this.aGoDownButton, vGbc);
204        // milieu : panneau avec look/eat/back
205        JPanel vMiddleCommands = new JPanel(new GridLayout(1, 7, 5, 5));
206        vMiddleCommands.add(this.aLookButton);
207        vMiddleCommands.add(this.aEatButton);
208        vMiddleCommands.add(this.aBackButton);
209        vMiddleCommands.add(this.aTakeButton);
210        vMiddleCommands.add(this.aDropButton);
211        vMiddleCommands.add(this.aItemsButton);
212        vMiddleCommands.add(this.aTestButton);
213        vGbc.gridx = 1; vGbc.gridy = 1; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.NONE;
214        vSouthPanel.add(vMiddleCommands, vGbc);
215        // bouton Quit à droite du bas
216        vGbc.gridx = 4; vGbc.gridy = 2; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
217        vSouthPanel.add(this.aQuitButton, vGbc);
218        vBottomPanel.add(vSouthPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
219        
220        // Zone de saisie des commandes (en bas du bas)
221        JPanel vCommandPanel = new JPanel(new BorderLayout());
222        vCommandPanel.add(new JLabel("Command: "), BorderLayout.WEST);
223        vCommandPanel.add(this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.CENTER);
224        vBottomPanel.add(vCommandPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
225        
226        vPanel.add(vBottomPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
227        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
228        //this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( this.aQuitButton, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
229
230        // add some event listeners to some components
231        this.aQuitButton.addActionListener(this);
232        this.aGoNorthButton.addActionListener(this);
233        this.aGoSouthButton.addActionListener(this);
234        this.aGoEastButton.addActionListener(this);
235        this.aGoWestButton.addActionListener(this);
236        this.aGoUpButton.addActionListener(this);
237        this.aGoDownButton.addActionListener(this);
238        this.aLookButton.addActionListener(this);
239        this.aEatButton.addActionListener(this);
240        this.aBackButton.addActionListener(this);
241        this.aTakeButton.addActionListener(this);
242        this.aDropButton.addActionListener(this);
243        this.aItemsButton.addActionListener(this);
244        this.aTestButton.addActionListener(this);
245
246        // to end program when window is closed
247        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
248            new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
249                @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
250                {
251                    System.exit(0);
252                }
253        } );
254
255        this.aMyFrame.pack();
256        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
257        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
258        this.enable(true);
259    } // createGUI()
260
261    /**
262     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
263     */
264    @Override public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) 
265    {
266        // no need to check the type of action at the moment
267        // because there is only one possible action (text input) :
268        if(pE.getSource() == this.aQuitButton){
269            //this.aEngine.endGame();
270            this.processCommand("quit");
271            Timer vTimer = new Timer(1000, ev -> System.exit(0));
272            vTimer.setRepeats(false);
273            vTimer.start();
274
275        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aGoNorthButton){
276            this.processCommand("go north");
277
278        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aGoSouthButton){
279            this.processCommand("go south");
280
281        }  else if(pE.getSource() == this.aGoWestButton){
282            this.processCommand("go west");
283
284        }  else if(pE.getSource() == this.aGoEastButton){
285            this.processCommand("go east");        
286
287        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aGoUpButton){
288            this.processCommand("go up");
289
290        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aGoDownButton){
291            this.processCommand("go down");        
292
293        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aLookButton){
294            this.processCommand("look");
295
296        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aEatButton){
297            // Open dialog to choose an item present in the room
298            List<String> vOptionsList = this.aEngine.getPlayerItemNames();
299            String[] vOptions = vOptionsList.toArray(new String[0]);
300            if (vOptions == null || vOptions.length == 0){
301                this.println("There are no items to eat here.");
302            } else {
303                String vChoice = (String) JOptionPane.showInputDialog(
304                    this.aMyFrame,
305                    "Choose an item to eat:",
306                    "Eat",
307                    JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE,
308                    null,
309                    vOptions,
310                    vOptions[0]
311                );
312                if (vChoice != null && !vChoice.isEmpty()){
313                    this.processCommand("eat " + vChoice);
314                }
315            }
316        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBackButton){
317            this.processCommand("back");
318
319        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aTakeButton){
320            // Open dialog to choose an item present in the room
321           List<String> vOptionsList = this.aEngine.getCurrentRoomItemNames();
322            String[] vOptions = vOptionsList.toArray(new String[0]);
323            if (vOptions == null || vOptions.length == 0){
324                this.println("There are no items to take here.");
325            } else {
326                String vChoice = (String) JOptionPane.showInputDialog(
327                    this.aMyFrame,
328                    "Choose an item to take:",
329                    "Take",
330                    JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE,
331                    null,
332                    vOptions,
333                    vOptions[0]
334                );
335                if (vChoice != null && !vChoice.isEmpty()){
336                    this.processCommand("take " + vChoice);
337                }
338            }
339
340        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aDropButton){
341            // Open dialog to choose an item from inventory to drop
342            List<String> vOptionsList = this.aEngine.getPlayerItemNames();
343            String[] vOptions = vOptionsList.toArray(new String[0]);
344            if (vOptions == null || vOptions.length == 0){
345                this.println("You have no items to drop.");
346            } else {
347                String vChoice = (String) JOptionPane.showInputDialog(
348                    this.aMyFrame,
349                    "Choose an item to drop:",
350                    "Drop",
351                    JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE,
352                    null,
353                    vOptions,
354                    vOptions[0]
355                );
356                if (vChoice != null && !vChoice.isEmpty()){
357                    this.processCommand("drop " +vChoice);
358                }
359            }
360
361        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aItemsButton){
362            this.processCommand("items");
363
364        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aTestButton){
365            // Open dialog to ask user for a file to test
366            String vFile = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(
367                this.aMyFrame,
368                "Enter the file to test:",
369                "Test File",
370                JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE
371            );
372            if (vFile != null && !vFile.isEmpty()){
373                this.println("Testing file: " + vFile + "\n");
374                this.processCommand("test " + vFile);
375            }
376
377        } else if (pE.getSource() == this.aEntryField) {
378            String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
379            this.processCommand( vInput );
380           
381        } else {
382            this.processCommand(null);
383        }
384         // never suppress this line
385    } // actionPerformed(.)
386
387    /**
388     * A command has been entered in the entry field.  
389     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
390     * @param pInput The input command string.
391     */
392    public void processCommand(final String pInput)
393    {
394        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( pInput );
395        this.aEntryField.setText( "" ); // clear the input field
396        
397    } // processCommand()
398} // UserInterface 
399
